name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a passion for vintage technology. With its sleek box-shaped body resembling a cat, Retrotron stands out in the WebtrES club. Its arms and legs are designed with a hand-down feature, allowing it to interact with various devices and gadgets. The robot's screen displays a mesmerizing red and black pattern, adding a touch of nostalgia to its appearance. Sporting a pair of stylish glasses, Retrotron exudes an air of sophistication and intelligence. As a member of the WebtrES club, Retrotron showcases its exceptional ability to analyze and interpret electronic signals with precision and accuracy.
